attributes.action: Consider rural 4x4s, where the owner is a smallholder, farmer, vet or other rural trade, being of a limited (lesser) tax category
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current trend of attempting to drive 4x4s off the roads in major towns and cities is supported but there is a section of the community for whom 4x4s are a feature of their very existence and necessary to carry out their normal business. If a 4x4 is owned by a rural occupation or a resident of a rural community that vehicle should be more reasonably taxed than that of a city dweller. They already pay high fuels taxes and usually have higher mileage because of their remoteness.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
